miapi.tm_arsenal.gemstone_melee.strength: Applies Strength effect when hitting a Entity
miapi.tm_arsenal.gemstone_melee.unstable: When you kill an entity with this Weapon the entity will Explode
Applies Poison and Glowing effect when hitting a Entity
miapi.tm_arsenal.gemstone_melee.armoring: Applies Resistance effect on wielder when hitting a Entity
miapi.tm_arsenal.gemstone_melee.lucky.de: Applies Luck effect on wielder when hitting a Entity
miapi.tm_arsenal.gemstone_melee.quickeni: Applies Speed effect on wielder when hitting a Entity
tm_arsenal.material_indication.blade.dam: Attack damage scales with directly with this
tm_arsenal.material_indication.blade.att: Attack speed scales with directly with this
tm_arsenal.material_indication.blade.blo: Blocking scales with directly with this
tm_arsenal.material_indication.blade.stu: Stunning scales with directly with this
tm_arsenal.material_indication.default.m: The tools mining speed and level is set by this material
tm_arsenal.material_indication.scythe.ti: The Harvest Radius is set by the material tier
tm_arsenal.material_indication.axe_cutte: Amount of logs scales with material tier

miapi.module.tm_arsenal.handheld.gauntle: Gauntlets are a great protection of your hands while smashing them into something.
A Handle for Single hand small Weapons.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.handheld.katar.d: A Small Dagger designed for swift, close-range combat.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.handheld.tonfa.d: A Tonfa, great to stun opponents.
miapi.ability.heavy_attack.title: Heavy Attack
miapi.ability.heavy_attack.description:
Right Click to Heavy Attack
Dealing %s times the Damage and %s blocks of Range
Right click has to be held for %s seconds
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.blade.mace.name: Mace
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.blade.dagger.des: A common blade head, often used by thieves and scoundrels.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.blade.greatsword: A massive two-handed sword used for heavy strikes.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.blade.zweihaende: A medieval german Blade, great for parrying and its thin blade can pierce armor.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.blade.katana.des: A traditional Japanese sword known for its sharpness and precision, deals poorly with armor
A versatile and balanced sword that offers a good balance between speed and power and range.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.blade.rapier.des: A slender and agile sword designed for piercing armor.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.blade.normal.des: A classic and versatile sword used by warriors across various cultures.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.blade.throwing_k: A small and lightweight knife designed for throwing with accuracy.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.blade.sickle.des: A small Sickle head. There might be some symbolism.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.blade.scythe.des: A long Scythe head. Usually used to cut grass or People down
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.guard.tool_adapt: Tool Adapter to allow Tools to be stuck ontop of the handle
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.guard.large.name: %s Large Guard
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.guard.large.desc: A guard specifically designed for blocking.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.guard.katana.des: A guard specifically designed for use with a katana sword.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.guard.normal.des:
A standard guard suitable for most sword types.
Has increased durability.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.guard.slim.name: %s Slim Guard
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.guard.slim.descr: A slender guard that reduces weight and allows for quicker strikes.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.guard.socket.des: A Guard that adds a Position to socket Magical Gemstones or Artifacts.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.guard.dual_socke: A Guard that adds a Position to socket two small Magical Gemstones or Artifacts.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.guard.winged.des: A guard with decorative wing-like extensions for aesthetic appeal and improved balance.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.pommel.socket.de: A pommel featuring a small Slot for a magical Gemstone.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.pommel.cross.des: A pommel featuring a cross-shaped design for added grip and aesthetics.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.pommel.round.des: A spherical pommel that provides a balanced weight distribution and comfortable grip.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.pommel.spike.des: A pommel featuring a spike-like protrusion for increased piercing capability.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.handle.polearm.d: A long handle suitable for polearm weapons, providing reach and leverage.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.handle.tool.name: %s Tool Handle
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.handle.tool.desc: A sturdy handle designed for tool-like weapons, offering durability and functionality.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.handle.sword.des: A standard-sized handle suitable for most sword types.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.twin_blade.name: %s Twin Blade
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.handle.twin.name: %s Twin Handle
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.handle.twin.desc:
Am impractical Twin Handle for Double the Blades.
 Looks cool though.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.tool.axe_throwin: An axe primarily built to be thrown, can also be used as a Melee Weapon.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.tool.axe_front.d: A front part of an axe used for cutting and stripping wood. Can also be used for combat.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.tool.hammer.name: %s Hammer
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.tool.hammer.desc: A massive Hammer, can mine 3x3 Areas.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.tool.excavator.d: A massive Shovel, can mine 3x3 Areas.
A Lumbermans Axe, can fell whole trees in a fells swoop.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.tool.axe_back.de: A back part of an axe used for cutting and stripping wood. Can also be used for combat.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.tool.pickaxe_fro: A front part of a pickaxe used for breaking and mining blocks.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.tool.pickaxe_bac: A back part of a pickaxe used for prying and chipping.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.tool.shovel.name: %s Shovel
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.tool.shovel.desc: A tool with a broad scoop used for digging and moving earth.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.tool.tool_back.d: A back part of a tool used for balancing the weight of the tool head.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.tool.hoe_front.d: A front part of a hoe used for tilling soil.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.blade.spear.name: %s Spear
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.blade.spear.desc: A front part of a spear used to stab people.
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.blade.trident.de: A Trident Head, sometimes also called a Fork.
miapi.tm_arsenal.tree_mining.description: Amount of Logs mined at once
miapi.tm_arsenal.compat.ht_treechop.desc: Amount of Cuts done cutting down a tree
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.gem.medium.end_c: Highly unstable Crystal harnessed to explode killed Enemies
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.gem.medium.heart: Harnessing the Power of the Heart of the sea
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.gem.medium.nethe: With the power of a Slain Wither you can Channel its hatred to slay one specific Target
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.gem.medium.ender: Using the Power of the Enderpearl using Spatial Interdiction to block Teleporting
Using the Ender Eye you can track your opponents for a short bit
miapi.module.tm_arsenal.gem.medium.condu: Harnessing the power of a Conduit in a Item
